/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package examples.outer

import examples.outer.OuterModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template OuterRenderer filled up
 * with the content of the passed models.
 */
object OuterRenderer {

    fun renderTemplate(outerModel: OuterModel): String {
        return """
          |
          |
          |
          |class ${outerModel.entityName}Service {
          |
          |    fun get${outerModel.entityName}(): String {
          |        return "${outerModel.entityName}"
          |    }
          |
          |
          |
          |    fun outerMethod(): String {
          |        return "outer ${outerModel.entityName} method"
          |    }
          |
          |}
          |
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }

    fun filePath(outerModel: OuterModel): String {
      return "dummy-dir/author-subdir/dummy-${outerModel.entityName}.txt"
    }
}
